        public boolean isValid()

        loaded poll

      • getResultOfQuestion

        public java.util.List<echo.evs.dto.Item> getResultOfQuestion​(echo.evs.dto.Question question)
        Get the result of a question meaning no of abstention and votes of all items
        Parameters:
        question - question for which you want the result
        Returns:
        list of items including an abstention item with its number of votes

      • getPercentage

        public java.lang.String getPercentage​(java.lang.Integer votesForThisItem,
                                      java.lang.Integer totalVotes)
        Calculate the percentage based on votes of an item and total votes given
        Parameters:
        votesForThisItem - number of votes of an item
        totalVotes - number of votes of a question
        Returns:
        string representing percentage value in decimal format

      • deletePoll

        public void deletePoll()
        Deletes the loaded poll

      • publishPoll

        public void publishPoll()
        Publishes a poll. Checks is poll hasn't been published yet and is in state FINISHED and also has enough votes.

        public boolean isSuccess()
        Checks wether success is true
        Returns:
        true if success is set to true
